thread.title: Kobe Bryant leaves game early to visit Lamar Odom
thread.title_full: Kobe Bryant leaves game early to visit Lamar Odom

title: Kobe Bryant leaves game early to visit Lamar Odom
persons: Lamar Odom Stephen Dunn Kobe Bryant
text:
Updated: 7:42 a.m. Wednesday, Oct. 14, 2015 | Posted: 7:14 a.m. Wednesday, Oct. 14, 2015 Kobe Bryant leaves game early to visit Lamar Odom Stephen Dunn Kobe Bryant and Lamar Odom Related By Cox Media Group National Content Desk LAS VEGAS ‚Äî 
Kobe Bryant left the Los Angeles Lakers' preseason game early Tuesday night. 
The official reason was a leg contusion, or a bruise, but he actually left the MGM Grand Garden Arena in Vegas to visit former teammate Lamar Odom, Fox Sports reported. 
Odom was found at a Nevada brothel unconscious earlier Tuesday. 
Bryant is not the only big name to visit Odom as he fights for his life. 
Mitch Kupchack, the Lakers' general manager, also went to the Las Vegas hospital, Fox Sports reported. 
Other NBA players have gone to social media to express their sympathy over the situation. PRAYERS all the way UP for my brother Lamar Odom!!! ‚Äî Vince Carter (@mrvincecarter15) October 14, 2015 Prayers go out to Lamar Odom and his family please God anything u can do to help him thru thisüôè ‚Äî Paul Pierce (@paulpierce34) October 14, 2015 
Odom's former wife Khloe Kardashian is also by his side according to media reports. 
Odom, according to Dennis Hof, the brothel's owner, was taking "herbal Viagra," NBC News reported. 
No illegal drugs were found in Odom's room, Hof told NBC News . 
He had checked into the brothel Saturday, was found unconscious Tuesday afternoon local time.
